attributes.action: Reserve the 4th plinth in Trafalgar square for a statue of Elizabeth ll
attributes.additional_details: The public believe that the 4th plinth should honour our late Queen, and the 4th plinth should be reserved solely for her.
attributes.background:
I want the government to install a static of the late Queen Elizabeth the second, in stead of the ' art' that Sadiq Khan wants to install
 That plinth should be for the greatest and longest reigning Monarch in our history.

rejection.details:
Decisions about what is displayed on Trafalgar Square is a matter for the Mayor of London and London Assembly, not the Government or House of Commons.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions

You can also contact your local London Assembly Members about this issue. You can find out who they are and how to contact them here: https://www.london.gov.uk/who-we-are/what-london-assembly-does/london-assembly-members
